name: Dentons Agribusiness Podcast Series
description: Podcast series looking at a key pillar to the Canada’s economic system, the agriculture and agri-food sector.  From farming to distribution, advancements in ag-tech, food producers and manufacturers, this podcast series will exam the vast ecosystem that encompasses everything agriculture.

recent_episodes.title: Advancing superfood innovation and unlocking the power of the Haskap Berry
recent_episodes.description: In episode 19, Heather Barnhouse speaks with Kiren Singh, Co-Founder of Haskalife, a Canadian company specializing in developing products from the haskap berry, a superfood native to northern boreal regions. Kiren shares her journey from a 30-year corporate career in the energy sector to founding Haskalife, discussing the challenges of educating consumers about the berry’s health benefits and its potential in the agribusiness market. She highlights the importance of collaboration and the grow

recent_episodes.title: Supporting farm and food businesses through mentorship and strategic growth
recent_episodes.description: In episode 18, Heather Barnhouse speaks with Katy Chang, Founder and Executive Chef of EatsPlace, a Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) that supports farm and food businesses. In this episode, Katy shares her journey from chef to leader, highlighting the critical role of strategic mentorship in empowering agribusinesses to navigate challenges such as financial literacy, access to capital, and overcoming regulatory barriers. Katy also discusses her plans to expand EatsPlace to A

recent_episodes.title: Farming Success: tax strategies, business tools, and risk prevention
recent_episodes.description: Heather Barnhouse, KC, Keith Hennel and Adam Kotlowitz return to review key considerations that can help set farmers up for success. They will talk about the Canadian Entrepreneurs Incentive, capital gains exemptions, pros and cons of incorporation and joint ventures, what to look for when obtaining tax and legal advice, and how to help prevent risks and disputes along the way.

score_reason: Canadian agribusiness ecosystem focus with business strategy angle perfectly suits Andreas's 6 Seeds work and agency exit story.
